ygData.msgSnippet: Aracnia looked up at her crew. Assembled before her stood Rampage, Inferno, Tankkor, Tarantulas, Paralysis, and Aerostreak. Quickstikre was here also. Rat Trap

Subject: It begins...agian.
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 82
From: JP3884@...

    Aracnia looked up at her crew. Assembled before her stood Rampage, 
Inferno, Tankkor, Tarantulas, Paralysis, and Aerostreak. Quickstikre was here 
also. Rat Trap remained locked in the brig. Besides that, the ship was empty.
    "We are going to seige the Allience today. I want everyone packed, armed, 
and ready to move out in an hour. Now move." She commanded, and the crew 
scattered. She turned to Quickstrike.
    "Subcommander, I want you to rig this ship to self destruct on my 
command? Allience stratigy is usually to go after the ship of the oppent 
while in battle. If that happens, I want this ship to blow up and take any 
Allience attackers with it. Understand?" She said, not giving him any slack. 
"I want it to blow a crater that will cover upto a mile at least. Any bot who 
tries to take on this base, will die."
    She turned once more, and looked around her old, battered ship with a bit 
of nostalgia.

    Megatron, Hell Beast, Gremlin, Waspinator, Aquarious, Paddletail, and 
Adrax stood on the command floor of the cavern. Megatron told them of the 
plan, and they agreed.
    "And what is this I hear of a clone in Kitkats ship?" Megatron demanded, 
looking at Paddletail. He narrowd his eyes.
    "Well....um...sir....Nighteyes optic camera recoreded a clone of you in 
Kitkats ship. That all I...um...know." The Maximal said.
    Megatron frowned. "Well, she will just have to explain herself to me, 
wont she? Everyone get packed. We depart in 20 minutes."
    Hell Beast shook his head. He didnt like this fighting thing.... 
diplomatics were so much more cleaner and less tiresome. "I dont suppose that 
the Allience is willing to surrender under certian terms?"
    Megatron barked, "No, they are not! Everyone o nthe double!"
